questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes because the image shows a character card with an aura grading system visualized above it.
no because the image is larger and more detailed than a real card would typically be after cropping.
no because the label at the top does not contain the title 'GNRLYXYZ'.
no because '1/1' is not displayed directly below anything resembling 'GNRLYXYZ'.
no because there is no barcode present beneath '1/1' or any other location.
no because there is no grade label on the right side of the label at the top.
no because there is no numeric grade displayed below any grade label.
no because there is no certification number displayed below any numeric grade.
no because the text sizes vary across different elements of the label.
no because the padding from the border varies for different texts on the label.
yes because the background around the display is white.
no because the display includes various texts and labels on the card, not showing it fully without them.
